A new paper by @Cobey2024-re reports on the responses of *n*=1,630 respondents to a survey about the degree to which there is a reproducibility crisis in biomedicine.

![Figure 1 from @Cobey2024-re.](https://journals.plos.org/plosbiology/article/figure/image?size=original&download=&id=10.1371/journal.pbio.3002870.g001)

Reasons indicated for challenges in reproducibility largely mirror those from the @Baker2016-rz study in *Nature*.

![Table 2 from @Cobey2024-re.](https://journals.plos.org/plosbiology/article/figure/image?size=large&download=&id=10.1371/journal.pbio.3002870.t002)
